Dear Prof. Goodwin


I have some difficulty with understanding  solving process in OneD 
simulations runs in Python.
I use class burner flame with the energy equation disabled, set 
fixed temperature profile and I 

wonder how looks the mathematical algorithm of calculations. Does 
Cantera use the equations of 

energy balance, Arrhenius equation or another? How the numeric 
course of calculations introduces 

? 
I have to describe in simple way, a imathematical and numerical 
solving question in my graduate 

work. Coul you help me or specify where can I find specyfic 
information? 

P.S. I have succesfully ended simulations using Cantera.I studied 
dependence of fuel composition 

and lamda on formation precursors of polycyclic aromatic 
hydrocarbons in a premixed laminar flame 

with Marinow kinetic mechanism n-butane.   

best regards

Steve Patyk
